attributes.action: Bring back paper bags in supermarkets for fruit & Veg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why have we got these awful plastic bags everywhere for us to put our fruit and veg in? They sweat the veg and it doesn't last as long as it could. The paper bag absorbs the moisture, therefore keeping it fresher for longer. 

Bring back paper bags!
